Reviews.Title: “standard hotel - close to airport”

Reviews.Content: wife booked tryp 611 priceline reasonable price hotel unfortunately doesn´t offer complimentary shuttle decided public bus wasn´t easy location alright hotel close metro station clean bathroom standard bathtub european 4 star hotel hotel doesn´t offer free complimentary wifi sucks bed mediocre 2 single beds pushed didn´t double beds nonsmoking ok experience service fair priceline price
